entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as the one who will face the boggart. He is described as uncertain and wondering what was coming next.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is guiding Neville on how to deal with the boggart. He explains that the boggart will assume the form of Professor Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is mentioned as the form that the boggart will take. Neville's task is to make the boggart take on this form.

entities.name: boggart
entities.description: The boggart is a monster that can take on different forms. It is described as being forced into a vulture-topped hat and a green dress with a big red handbag.

relationships.description: Neville will face the boggart, which will assume the form of Professor Snape.
Professor Lupin guides Neville on how to deal with the boggart.
